title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder in the software is not behaving as expected.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and reopening the hyperlink builder, its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected behavior is that the hyperlink builder's title should remain 'Hyperlink Options' even after clicking 'OK' and reopening it.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Click on 'OK' in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
